name: Maritime War Risk Insurance
objective: To provide war risk insurance to U.S.-flag and foreign vessels whenever it appears to the Secretary of Transportation that adequate insurance for waterborne commerce cannot be obtained on reasonable terms and conditions from commercial companies.
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Domestic Threats and Hazards

results.description: Provides war risk insurance to U.S.-flag and foreign vessels whenever it appears to the Secretary of Transportation that adequate insurance for waterborne commerce cannot be obtained on reasonable terms and conditions from commercial companies.

authorizations.text: Merchant Marine Act of 1936. U.S.C. Pub. L. 110, 417. 46 U.S.C. § 539.

rules_regulations: Rules and Regulations are set forth under 46 CFR 308 (as published under authority of Public Law 101-115) and 309 as amended from time to time in the Federal Register.

pons.pon: Harden Critical Infrastructure Against Security Threats
